Value.Item: What can I get for you?
I have nothing left to sell.
If you had a merchant,\nI could send it there...
Anything else I can do\nfor you?
Thank you for your custom.\nDrop in again!
I see. Then be sure to return\nif you change your mind.
Your hands are full.\nSend it to <merchant>?
That's a shame. You could\ncarry it if you made room.
I have nothing left to sell.
If you had a merchant,\nI could send it to you.
Hee hee... Wait a minute.\nI can't buy that!
Is there anything else\nyou'll be needing?
Hee hee... Let's keep this\nbetween us, okay?
Your hands are full.\nSend it to <merchant>?
Hee hee... I'll send it then.
Ah, well... You could take\nit if you made room.
Would you like to wager\n<cost> gold?
Fight 'til defeat, or press\nthe B Button to yield.
So you won, eh? Here's\nyour prize. <cost> gold.
Ahh, you lost? I'd hoped\nfor better from you.
You don't have the money!\nTry again later.
What? You yield? Well,\nyour gold is mine, then!
If the village has been visited stop spawning from it
If first Warrior, give a key and set him to drop it
